question: Show all employees assigned to the 'Cloud Migration' project.
mysql_example: SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_projects ep ON e.id = ep.employee_id WHERE ep.project_id = 4;
sqlite_example: SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_projects ep ON e.id = ep.employee_id WHERE ep.project_id = 4;
